client

Interface IRCClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IRCClientImpl

    public interface IRCClient

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addListener(IRCEventListener listener)
      Adds a listener for the IRC events dispatched by the IRCClient.
      java.util.Set<IRCChannel> getAllChannels()
      Returns a set with all the channels known by the client.
      java.util.Set<IRCUser> getAllUsers()
      Returns a set with all the users known by the client.
      IRCChannel getChannel(java.lang.String channelName)
      Returns the IRCChannel with that name if known to the client, or null if not.
      IRCUser getClientUser()
      Returns the IRCUser that represents the client.
      IRCConfiguration getConfiguration()
      Returns the configuration of the client.
      java.lang.String getNick()
      Returns the nick of the client.
      IRCUser getUser(java.lang.String userName)
      Returns the IRCUser with that userName or null if there is no one.
      void join(java.util.List<java.lang.String> channelNames)
      Attempts to joins the channels with the received names.
      void join(java.util.List<java.lang.String> channelNames, java.util.List<java.lang.String> passwords)
      Attempts to joins the channels with the received names and passwords.
      void join(java.lang.String channelName)
      Attempts to joins the channel with the received name.
      void join(java.lang.String channelName, java.lang.String password)
      Attempts to joins the channel with the received name and password.
      void leave(IRCChannel channel)
      Leaves the channel received.
      void run()
      Connects to the server and then it occupies of the connection, reading and sending messages.
      void sendChannelMessage(IRCChannel channel, java.lang.String message)
      Attempts to send the message through the channel.
      void sendCommand(IRCCommand command)
      Sends the command to the server.
      void sendPrivateMessage(IRCUser user, java.lang.String message)
      Attempts to send the private message to the user.
      void sendRawLine(java.lang.String message)
      Sends the raw IRC message through the connection.
      void setNickname(java.lang.String newNick)
      Attempts to change the nick of the client to newNick.
      void stop()
      Stops the client from executing.
      void stop(java.lang.String message)
      Stops the client from executing with the message received.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        void run()
  throws IRCException
        Connects to the server and then it occupies of the connection, reading and sending messages.
        Throws:
        IRCException - If some other I/O or connection error occurs.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the client from executing.

      • stop

        void stop(java.lang.String message)
        Stops the client from executing with the message received.
        Parameters:
        message - Message to show as quit message.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If message is null.

      • join

        void join(java.lang.String channelName)
        Attempts to joins the channel with the received name. Ignores it if already joined.
        Parameters:
        channelName - Name of the channel to be joined.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If channelName is null.

      • join

        void join(java.lang.String channelName,
          java.lang.String password)
        Attempts to joins the channel with the received name and password. Ignores it if already joined.
        Parameters:
        channelName - Name of the channel to be joined.
        password - Password of the channelName.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If channelName is null.

      • join

        void join(java.util.List<java.lang.String> channelNames)
        Attempts to joins the channels with the received names. Ignores it if already joined.
        Parameters:
        channelNames - Names of the channels to be joined.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If channelNames is null or any channel name is null.

      • join

        void join(java.util.List<java.lang.String> channelNames,
          java.util.List<java.lang.String> passwords)
        Attempts to joins the channels with the received names and passwords. Ignores it if already joined. If a channel has no password it should be null in the list.
        Parameters:
        channelNames - Names of the channels to be joined.
        passwords - Passwords of the channels to be joined.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If channelNames or any channel name is null.

      • leave

        void leave(IRCChannel channel)
        Leaves the channel received. Ignores it if the client is not on it.
        Parameters:
        channel - Channel to be left.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If channel is null.

      • setNickname

        void setNickname(java.lang.String newNick)
        Attempts to change the nick of the client to newNick.
        Parameters:
        newNick - New nick of the client.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If newNick is null.

      • sendChannelMessage

        void sendChannelMessage(IRCChannel channel,
                        java.lang.String message)
        Attempts to send the message through the channel.
        Parameters:

        message - Message to be sent.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If channel or message are null.

        Parameters:

        message - Message to be sent.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If user or message are null.
